sentences.en: All single full-time students must reside in university residence halls.
sentences.cn: 所有单身的全日制学生都必须住大学宿舍。

sentences.en: Do you permanently reside in Beijing? How about your parents?
sentences.cn: 你已经在北京定居了 吗 ?你的父母 呢 ?

sentences.en: Documents can reside locally once downloaded and continue to function.
sentences.cn: 文档一旦下载了,就驻留在本地并继续工作.

sentences.en: Executive power resides in the President.
Happiness does not reside in strength or money.
sentences.cn: 幸福不是由实力或金钱决定的。

sentences.en: He spent most of his time in Rutherglen, where his family resided.
sentences.cn: 他大部分时间都在拉瑟格伦度过，他的家人就在那里居住。

sentences.en: I reside at the mission at St Michael's.
sentences.cn: 我住在圣·米歇尔教堂的传道会里。

sentences.en: I reside in Salt Lake City.
I reside, of course, in a well - protected fortress.
sentences.cn: 当然, 我住在一座守卫森严的保垒中.

sentences.en: In our example, the 256 - location RAM will reside in the last 256 locations of the memory.
sentences.cn: 在本例中, 256个地址的RAM占用了存贮器的最后256个单元.

sentences.en: Jim and Meg reside at the Grand Hotel.
sentences.cn: 吉姆和梅格住在格兰德旅馆.

sentences.en: Most of the chlorofluoromethanes reside in the lower stratosphere.
sentences.cn: 大多数氯氟甲烷存留在平流层下部.

sentences.en: That city that I reside is the most beautiful.
sentences.cn: 我居住的那个城市极其美丽.

sentences.en: That electrically charged particles reside within atoms had been surmised since the time of Faraday.
sentences.cn: 从法拉第的时代起,人们就已推测到,在原子内存在着带电的粒子.

sentences.en: The true face of Lushan is lost to my sight , for it is right in this mountain that I reside.
sentences.cn: 不识庐山真面目, 只缘身在此山中.

sentences.en: They reside in the upper - right corner of the VI's front panel window.
sentences.cn: 他们的位置在VI前面板窗口的右上角.

sentences.en: You will reside there, serving as the building superintendent.
sentences.cn: 你要居住在那里, 作为大楼管理者服务大家.

words.tran_cn: 居住的；住院医师；定居的

trans.tran_en: to live in a particular place

trans.tran_cn: 住，居住，（官吏）留驻，驻在，（性质）存在，具备，（权力，权利等）属于，归于
trans.tran_en: to live in a particular place
